text: Egh 434plan azeniba gɨvaghtɨ, me gumazir God en akurvaghasa mɨsevezim mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham. Eghtɨ an bizitam ikian kogham.9:26 Hibrun akam deragha vezɨn kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ. Eghtɨ atrivir gavgavir mamɨn mɨdorozir gumazir bɨzir ekiam izɨva Jerusalem ko Godɨn Dɨpenim gasɨghasɨgham. Eghtɨ dughiar abuananamɨn, mati aperiam faner ekiamɨn otogha, biziba atera zui. Eghtɨ mɨdorozir ekiam ikɨ mangɨtɨ, God mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, dughiar abuananam otogham.
